sentences.english: As far as the plot goes, we know how it's going to end.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道故事情节将怎样结束。

sentences.english: How can I rebuild my trust in him?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才能重新建立起我对他的信任？

sentences.english: How do I submit an expense report?
How do almond-flavored liqueurs derive their flavor?
sentences.chinese: 杏味甜酒是怎样得到这种味道的？

sentences.english: OK.What about other kinds of rotations?
sentences.chinese: 那其他的旋转是怎样的呢？

sentences.english: We went to see Coach, and she showed us how to collect sap too.
sentences.chinese: 我们去看教练，然后她也告诉了我们怎样采集糖树汁。

sentences.english: How should we evaluate China's educational work in the first 17 years?
sentences.chinese: 对全国教育战线十七年的工作怎样估计？

sentences.english: And what other ways can we make our real world more like these fantasy worlds?
sentences.chinese: 我们又能怎样把现实世界变得像那梦中的国度呢？

sentences.english: If you’re a burglar, tell me how to keep bad guys out of my house.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一个盗贼，告诉我怎样让坏蛋远离我的家。

sentences.english: Now, how you could really work through this.
sentences.chinese: 现在，你该怎样真正地做这件事。

sentences.english: How do these issues influence the implementation and improvement of BASIX?
sentences.chinese: 这些问题是怎样影响BASIX的实施和改善的？

sentences.english: How did you find the veal cutlet?
How do we hear chord progressions?
sentences.chinese: 我们要怎样才能听到和弦进行？

sentences.english: And how can Santa come down our skinny little chimney?
sentences.chinese: 还有，圣诞熊怎样从我们家窄窄的小烟囱下来？

sentences.english: So how do you become a good liar?
sentences.chinese: 那么，怎样才能成为一个好骗子呢？

sentences.english: At the very least, that will make it hard for a future President to keep tax-cut promises.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，下一任总统将很难兑现他们减税的承诺。

definition: to go to the bottom of a matter/after all/when all is said and done/(in an interrogative sentence) finally/outcome/result
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
how old?/how big?/how much?/so big/that much
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
(before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...?/Is there a ...?/(before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)?/Have (you, they etc) (verb, past participle)?
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
